languages.text:
This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} depends on the amount of its {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}:
-<indent=5%>If it has more than 70% of its total wounds, it has 55% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has 70–40% of its total wounds, it has 40% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has less than 40% of its total wounds, it has only 25% armour.</indent>
Also, it always suffers +20% toxic and {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Броня{/g} этого существа зависит от количества его {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Когда у существа более 70% от общего количества здоровья, оно получает 55% брони.</indent>
-<indent=5%>При 70–40% от общего количества здоровья существо получает 40% брони.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Когда у существа остается менее 40% от общего количества здоровья, оно получает всего 25% брони.</indent>
Токсичный и {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненный урон{/g} всегда наносят существу на 20% больше урона.

traits.locale_text:
This creature's armour depends on the amount of its wounds:
-<indent=5%>If it has more than 70% of its total wounds, it has 55% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has 70–40% of its total wounds, it has 40% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has less than 40% of its total wounds, it has only 25% armour.</indent>
Also, it always suffers +20% toxic and fire damage.

-<indent=5%>If it has more than 70% of its total wounds, it has 55% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has 70–40% of its total wounds, it has 40% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has less than 40% of its total wounds, it has only 25% armour.</indent>
Also, it always suffers +20% toxic and {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}.

-<indent=5%>If it has more than 70% of its total wounds, it has 55% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has 70–40% of its total wounds, it has 40% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has less than 40% of its total wounds, it has only 25% armour.</indent>
Also, it always suffers +20% toxic and {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Броня{/g} этого существа зависит от количества его {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Когда у существа более 70% от общего количества здоровья, оно получает 55% брони.</indent>
-<indent=5%>При 70–40% от общего количества здоровья существо получает 40% брони.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Когда у существа остается менее 40% от общего количества здоровья, оно получает всего 25% брони.</indent>
Токсичный и {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненный урон{/g} всегда наносят существу на 20% больше урона.

Die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} dieser Kreatur hängt von der Anzahl ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} ab:
-<indent=5%>Hat sie mehr als 70 % ihrer gesamten Wunden, verfügt sie über 55 % Rüstung.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Hat sie 70–40 % ihrer gesamten Wunden, verfügt sie über 40 % Rüstung.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Hat sie weniger als 40 % ihrer gesamten Wunden, verfügt sie nur über 25 % Rüstung.</indent>
Außerdem erleidet sie immer +20 % Gift- und {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} depends on the amount of its {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}:
-<indent=5%>If it has more than 70% of its total wounds, it has 55% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has 70–40% of its total wounds, it has 40% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has less than 40% of its total wounds, it has only 25% armour.</indent>
Also, it always suffers +20% toxic and {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Die {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} dieser Kreatur hängt von der Anzahl ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} ab:
-<indent=5 %>Wenn sie mehr als 70 % ihrer gesamten Wunden hat, verfügt sie über 55 % Rüstung.</indent>
-<indent=5 %>Wenn sie 70–40 % ihrer gesamten Wunden hat, verfügt sie über 40 % Rüstung.</indent>
-<indent=5 %>Wenn sie weniger als 40 % ihrer gesamten Wunden hat, verfügt sie nur über 25 % Rüstung.</indent>
Darüber hinaus erleidet sie stets +20 % Gift- und {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g}.

languages.text:
Le pourcentage d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de cette créature dépend de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} :
-<indent=5%>Si sa réserve totale de blessures est supérieure à 70 %, son armure est de 55 %.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si sa réserve totale de blessures est comprise entre 40 et 70 %, son armure est de 40 %.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si sa réserve totale de blessures est inférieure à 40 %, son armure n'est que de 25 %.</indent>
Par ailleurs, elle subit toujours +20 % de dégâts toxiques et de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} depends on the amount of its {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}:
-<indent=5%>If it has more than 70% of its total wounds, it has 55% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has 70–40% of its total wounds, it has 40% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has less than 40% of its total wounds, it has only 25% armour.</indent>
Also, it always suffers +20% toxic and {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Le pourcentage d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de cette créature dépend de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} :
- <indent=5%>Si sa réserve totale de blessures est supérieure à 70 %, son armure est de 55 %.</indent>
- <indent=5%>Si sa réserve totale de blessures est comprise entre 40 et 70 %, son armure est de 40 %.</indent>
- <indent=5%>Si sa réserve totale de blessures est inférieure à 40 %, son armure n'est que de 25 %.</indent>
Par ailleurs, elle subit toujours +20 % de dégâts toxiques et de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g}.

languages.text:
此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}取决于剩余的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}：
- <indent=5%>当生命值高于70%时，它的护甲为55%。</indent>
- <indent=5%>当生命值介于40%到70%之间时，它的护甲为40%。</indent>
- <indent=5%>当生命值低于40%时，它的护甲仅为25%。</indent>
此外，它受到的毒素与{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}提高20%。
languages.original_text:
This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} depends on the amount of its {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}:
-<indent=5%>If it has more than 70% of its total wounds, it has 55% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has 70–40% of its total wounds, it has 40% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has less than 40% of its total wounds, it has only 25% armour.</indent>
Also, it always suffers +20% toxic and {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}取决于剩余的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}：
- <indent=5%>当生命值高于70%时，它的护甲为55%。</indent>
- <indent=5%>当生命值介于40%到70%之间时，它的护甲为40%。</indent>
- <indent=5%>当生命值低于40%时，它的护甲仅为25%。</indent>
此外，它受到的毒素与{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}提高20%。

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} de esta criatura depende de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Si tiene más del 70 % de sus heridas, tiene un 55 % de armadura.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si tiene entre el 40 % y el 70 % de sus heridas, tiene un 40 % de armadura.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si tiene menos del 40 % de sus heridas, solo tiene un 25 % de armadura.</indent>
Además, siempre sufre +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} y tóxico.
languages.original_text:
This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} depends on the amount of its {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}:
-<indent=5%>If it has more than 70% of its total wounds, it has 55% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has 70–40% of its total wounds, it has 40% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has less than 40% of its total wounds, it has only 25% armour.</indent>
Also, it always suffers +20% toxic and {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} de esta criatura depende de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Si tiene más del 70 % de sus heridas, tiene un 55 % de armadura.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si tiene entre el 40 % y el 70 % de sus heridas, tiene un 40 % de armadura.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si tiene menos del 40 % de sus heridas, solo tiene un 25 % de armadura.</indent>
Además, siempre sufre +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} y tóxico.

languages.text:
この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の合計によって決まる。
-<indent=5%>合計の傷の70%以上の場合、アーマーは55%となる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>合計の傷の70–40%の場合、アーマーは40%となる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>傷の合計の40%以下の場合、アーマーはわずか25%となる。</indent>
また、常に毒および{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火のダメージ{/g}が +20%となる。
